Title: Relates to insurance rates, rating plans, rating rules and rate manuals for livery drivers
Summary: Relates to insurance rates, rating plans, rating rules and rate manuals for livery drivers; provides no such rate shall be approved by the superintendent if it is over 20% the rate used for equivalent black car operators.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to insurance rates, rating plans, rating rules and rate manuals for livery drivers
